title: RHOBH: Disco Stewing
description:
Garcelle and Erika clash at Rinna's disco party on The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. Plus, Kathy is still reeling from the "Homeless and Toothless Foundation."

Watch us record our recap with Crappens on Demand here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/70698634?pr=true
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
